mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STZ_REGION_APPLY_PROJECT_INFO( PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE, PROJECT_TYPE_LABLE, CATALOG_NAME, ENTERPRISE_NAME, LEREP_CERTTYPE, LEREP_CERTNO, PROJECT_NATURE, PROJECT_NATURE_LABEL, TOTAL_MONEY, YDMJ, ZJLY, START_YEAR, END_YEAR, ADDRESS_DETAIL, SCALE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{projectCode}, #{projectName}, #{projectType}, #{projectTypeLabel}, #{catalogName}, #{enterpriseName}, #{lerepCertType}, #{lerepCertNo}, #{projectNature}, #{projectNatureLabel}, #{totalMoney}, #{ydmj}, #{zjly}, #{startYear}, #{endYear}, #{addressDetail}, #{scaleContent} )
